mapper.select: select date(min(createtime)) as minDate, date(max(createtime)) as maxDate from sys_exception_log

SELECT count( b.id ) AS total FROM ( SELECT adddate( #{startTime}, numlist.id ) AS 'date' FROM ( SELECT n1.i + n10.i * 10 + n100.i * 100 AS id FROM num n1 CROSS JOIN num AS n10 CROSS JOIN num AS n100 ) AS numlist WHERE adddate( #{startTime}, numlist.id ) <= #{endTime} ) a LEFT JOIN sys_exception_log b ON date( b.createtime ) = a.date AND b.system = #{system} GROUP BY a.date ORDER BY a.date

SELECT a.date as dayTime, count( case when b.system='doctor_app_api' then 1 end ) AS doctorTotal, count( case when b.system='patient_app_api' then 1 end ) AS patientTotal, count( case when b.system='zkhc_pay_api' then 1 end) AS payTotal, count( case when b.system='app_admin' then 1 end) AS adminTotal FROM ( SELECT adddate( #{startTime}, numlist.id ) AS 'date' FROM ( SELECT n1.i + n10.i * 10 + n100.i * 100 AS id FROM num n1 CROSS JOIN num AS n10 CROSS JOIN num AS n100 ) AS numlist WHERE adddate( #{startTime}, numlist.id ) <= #{endTime} ) a LEFT JOIN sys_exception_log b ON date( b.createtime ) = a.date GROUP BY a.date ORDER BY a.date
select count(id) as total from sys_exception_log
select count(id) as value,system as name from sys_exception_log group by system
SELECT run_environment AS env, count( id ) AS total FROM sys_exception_log GROUP BY run_environment

SELECT LEVEL AS name , count( event_id ) AS value
FROM `APPLICATION_LOG` WHERE date( event_date ) = #{timeValue} GROUP BY LEVEL order by field(level,'INFO','WARN','ERROR')
SELECT level FROM `APPLICATION_LOG` GROUP BY level
